WorkItem.Description:
Child controls are added to panel in OnApplyTemplate() only. All subsequent changes in Controls collection have no effect.
Â 
As a workaround, you may specify ItemsPanel and operate with its Children collection directly.
But in this case there's an issue: added items are disabled (visually, IsEnabled property is 'true') until you click somewhere in Ribbon.
WorkItem.Summary: WPFRibbon: RibbonGroup doesn't reflect changes in Controls collection

Comments.Message:
Some details about disabled items: it is somehow related with item's Command.
CanExecute is not getting called until ribbon is clicked (focused?).

Controls without Command set are behaving correctly, but in existing model they are not usable without Command :(

Hi pieceofsummer,

We agree that this is a bug. We're filing a bug in our internal database to track this and it will be fixed in a future release.

Thanks,
Samantha
